vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PENNY_BY_PENNY.put (patch_5.sol#32-40):
	External calls:
	- Log.addMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Put) (patch_5.sol#36)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Acc (patch_5.sol#38)
